section:
Data Structures Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:Arena
Struct that saves all data about game arena Ball
Struct that saves all data about the ball Mouse
Struct that saves all data about the mouse Player
Struct that saves all data about one player timer_status_field_val
Union for storing values of timer status fields, including the full status byte Wall
Struct that saves all data about the wall (origianted by a power-up)
